title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modern Secrets: A Journey from Legacy Systems to AI-Ready Security (SEC213)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 现代密钥管理：从传统系统到AI就绪安全的演进之旅 (SEC213)
abstract: Learn from Acquia's journey from complex legacy systems to cutting-edge secrets management with AWS Secrets Manager. Discover how Acquia revolutionized its security infrastructure, mastering multi-tenant isolation and achieving zero-downtime migration across hundreds of services. This is a potential blueprint for your modern security architecture. Perfect for forward-thinking architects and security leaders, you'll get exclusive insights into Acquia's transformation and how Acquia leveraged its relationship with AWS to drive its roadmap for Agentic AI integration and improved security via automated secrets rotation. This is valuable glimpse into large-scale and seamless secrets management.
abstract_cn: 了解 Acquia 如何从复杂的传统系统迁移到使用 AWS Secrets Manager 的尖端密钥管理。探索 Acquia 如何彻底改革其安全基础设施，掌握多租户隔离并在数百个服务中实现零停机迁移。这是您现代安全架构的潜在蓝图。非常适合具有前瞻性思维的架构师和安全领导者，您将获得关于 Acquia 转型的独家见解，以及 Acquia 如何利用其与 AWS 的关系来推动其 Agentic AI 集成路线图并通过自动化密钥轮换提高安全性。这是对大规模无缝密钥管理的宝贵洞察。
